name: 哲學概論
description:
哲學是「大」學，也就是「根本」之學，是所有熱愛真理、追求智慧者，千百年來始終著迷的學問。在這門課裡，將帶領哲學新鮮人一起探索前輩哲學家們最關心的幾個核心議題，包括：知識、心靈、自由意志、自我、上帝、健全推理、世界真貌與道德行為。
Philosophy is a foundation discipline, the mother of all knowledge, as etymologically speaking it simply means the love of truth or the pursuit of wisdom. It is a subject which has enchanted intelligent people for thousands of years. As such, this course will lead freshmen to an exploration of the core topics that most preoccupied philosophers in the past. This includes knowledge, mind, freedom, self, God, reasoning, world, and morality.
goals: 了解知識與價值的根本問題
